title: Moldova Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Moldova increased 6.50 percent in August of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Moldova averaged 1.09 percent from 2011 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 38 percent in May of 2020 and a record low of -37.40 percent in January of 2017. In Moldova, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Moldova, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides the latest reported value for - Moldova Retail Sales MoM - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: National Bureau of Statistics of the Republic of Moldova
